alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 15 at 10:34PM MST until February 16 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. Snow showers are expected to come to an end during the early morning hours. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
